entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
